content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_axe
inventory=[{"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 26, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 20, "index": 17}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 47, "index": 26}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 52, "index": 30}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a diamond_axe, I first need to craft a stick. To craft a stick, I need to craft warped_planks which require placing 1 stripped_warped_stem in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the stripped_warped_stem from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Ok
